descriptionHtml:
[b]Alve [/b]is found at Moorside Inn in Morthal.

Info/spec:
#1 She is marriable
#2 Serves as a follower (class: vampire)
#3 Non essential NPC (she can die)
#4 She is leveled to your character (ranging from level 15 to 999)

Without disrupting the game quests and avoid rendering save files asunder. Closest thing we can have to the original is a clone, a replication. While it is not original. As in her. Only difference in this case of Alva, is that she is not dead.

To be bound together, now and forever. Or die together, fighting together.

(Textures and Meshes directories have been included to avoid a character appearance bug. That causes the head of the NPC to not match the body.)
author: Feralas
